content.en: Blockchain optimization: Researchers are exploring how to optimize various aspects of blockchain-enabled mobile-edge computing and Internet of Things (IoT) systems. They are using algorithms such as deep reinforcement learning, Bayesian reinforcement learning, and deep Q-network to improve cooperative computation offloading, resource allocation, latency, secure collaboration, energy-aware task offloading, and more. These algorithms are being applied to enhance the intelligence and efficiency of blockchain-based edge computing and IoT networks.
content.da: Blockchain optimering: Forskere undersøger, hvordan man kan optimere forskellige aspekter af blockchain-aktiveret mobil-edge computing og Internet of Things (IoT) systemer. De bruger algoritmer såsom deep reinforcement learning, Bayesian reinforcement learning og deep Q-netværk til at forbedre samarbejdende beregningsaflastning, ressourceallokering, latens, sikker samarbejde, energibevidst opgaveaflastning og mere. Disse algoritmer anvendes til at øge intelligensen og effektiviteten af blockchain-baseret edge computing og IoT-netværk.
